General.Name: Shandong Denghai Seeds Co Ltd
General.Description: ShanDongDenghai Seeds Co.,Ltd, an agricultural company, research, breeds, produces, packages, and sells crop seeds in China. It offers corn, wheat, rice, vegetables, flowers, and other seedlings. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Laizhou, China. ShanDongDenghai Seeds Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Laizhou Academy Of Agricultural Sciences.
